description:
go-tour: implements full screen width on slides without the embedded playground.

See: https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups=#!topic/golang-nuts/3C0au28yAGA

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go-tour/

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, adg@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

Can you please sign the CLA as per
http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html#Copyright ?


On 9 April 2013 12:58, <nick1presta@gmail.com> wrote:

> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, adg@golang.org (cc:
> golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>
> Please take another look.
>
>
> https://codereview.appspot.**com/8544043/<https://codereview.appspot.com/8544043/>
>

I did -- I signed it as nick@nickpresta.ca. I just resigned it as nick1presta@gmail.com

Thanks!

On 2013/04/09 03:04:29, adg wrote:
> Can you please sign the CLA as per
> http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html#Copyright ?
> 
> 
> On 9 April 2013 12:58, <mailto:nick1presta@gmail.com> wrote:
> 
> > Hello mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com, mailto:adg@golang.org (cc:
> > mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
> >
> > Please take another look.
> >
> >
> >
> https://codereview.appspot.**com/8544043/%3Chttps://codereview.appspot.com/8544043/>
> >

On 9 April 2013 13:08, <nick1presta@gmail.com> wrote:

> I did -- I signed it as nick@nickpresta.ca. I just resigned it as
> nick1presta@gmail.com
>

Ah, ok. Thanks.
